entities.description: Malfoy stood to one side, the sunlight gleaming on his white-blond head.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry caught Malfoy's eye and smirked.

entities.name: jordan
entities.description: It's Johnson, Johnson with the Quaffle, what a player that girl is,

relationships.description: Harry caught Malfoy's eye and smirked.
The umpire, Madam Hooch, ordered the captains to shake hands.
Angelina and Montague reached each other.
Harry saw Ron streak off toward the goal hoops.
Draco Malfoy was doing exactly the same.
Madam Hooch placed her whistle in her mouth and blew.
